Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.view.dynamic

Class UI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.demo.view.dynamic.UI
Direct Known Subclasses:
GUI, TUI
public abstract class UI extends Object
Abstract class defining the interface for the User Interface (ui) of the application.
